results.name: Triangle based on downward diagonals of A102426.
formula: T(n, k)=if(k<=n, binomial(floor((2n-k+2)/2)+n-k, floor((2n-k+1)/2)-n+k), 0) - _Paul Barry_, Jun 22 2005
results.author: _Russell Walsmith_, Jan 11 2005
ext: Corrected and extended by _Paul Barry_, Jun 22 2005
